description: Exposure settings

name: nightexposure
description: Time in ms (1000ms = 1 sec, range 1 - 240000 ms)
label: Exposure

name: nightgain
description: Light sensitivity. Starts at 1 till 16. A high value returns a brighter image but more noise too
label: Gain

name: nightautogain
description: Activate to enable auto-gain
label: Auto-Gain

name: gamma
description: -100 to 100. Changes the difference between light and dark areas. A hight value increases contrast
label: Gamma

name: brightness
description: 0 to 100. Changes the amount of light in the image. Low value = dark. high value = bright
label: Brightness

name: awb
description: Auto White Balance
label: AWB

name: wbr
description: Red component for the White Balance, range 0 - 10
label: Red balance

name: wbb
description: Blue component for the White Balance, range 0 - 10
label: Blue balance

name: nightbin
description: 1 = binning OFF (1x1), 2x2 binning, 4 = 4x4 binning
label: Binning

name: nightdelay
description: Delay between images in milliseconds. 1000ms = 1 sec.
label: Delay

name: daydelay
description: Delay between images during daytime in milliseconds. 1000ms = 1 sec.
label: Daytime Delay

name: quality
description: Quality range for a JPG image, range 0% - 100%
label: Quality

name: width
description: Image width. 0 = max width
label: Width

name: height
description: Image height. 0 = max height
label: Height

name: filename
description: No whitespaces in filename. Extensions allowed: .jpg
label: Filename

name: rotation
description: Set image rotation to enable proper orientation, range 0 - 359 degrees
label: Orientation

name: flip
description: Select a flipping option if you want to reverse the image along an axis
label: Flip

description: Image overlay settings

name: text
description: Default text to position at the top center at the image
label: Image Title

name: showTime
description: Show the current date and time at the top center at the image
label: Show Time

name: showDetails
description: Show image details at the top center at the image
label: Image Details

name: fontsize
description: Font size 6 - 160, default value 32
label: Font Size

name: fontcolor
description: Annotation text font color in gray scale value 0 (black) - 255 (white)
label: Font Color

name: background
description: Background annotation text color in gray scale value 0 (black) - 255 (white)
label: Background Color

description: Other settings

name: notificationimages
description: Activate to display notification images, e.g., 'Camera is off during the day'.
label: Notification Images

name: latitude
description: Latitude of the camera. Needs a number (0 to 90) and direction (N or S). Ex: 60.7N
label: Latitude

name: longitude
description: Longitude of the camera. Needs a number (0 to 180) and direction (E or W). Ex: 135.05W
label: Longitude

name: angle
description: Altitude of the sun in degrees relative to the horizon at which to start/stop capture
label: Angle

name: autofocus
description: Auto Focus
label: Auto Focus

name: debuglevel
description: Debug level, 0 is lowest level.
label: Debug Level

name: darkframe
description: Capture dark frames
label: Dark Frame

name: alwaysshowadvanced
description: Activate to always show the advanced options.
label: Always Show Advanced

name: showonmap
description: Activate to have your camera showing up on the allsky map. https://www.thomasjacquin.com/allsky-map
label: Show on Map

description: Camera Setup

name: location
description: The location of your camera. Ex: Whitehorse, YT, Canada
label: Location

name: owner
description: The owner of the camera. It can be your name or an association or observatory, etc
label: Owner

name: websiteurl
description: The URL of your website. ex: https://www.thomasjacquin.com/allsky
label: Website URL

name: imageurl
description:
The url or the image on your website. ex: https://wwww.thomasjacquin.com/allsky/image.jpg.
Right-click on the image and select Copy Image Address
label: Image URL

name: camera
description: The model of your camera. Ex: ASI 224MC or RPiHQ
label: Camera

name: lens
description: The lens you're using on your camera. Ex: Arecont 1.55
label: Lens

name: computer
description: The computer inside your allsky enclosure. Ex: Raspberry Pi 3
label: Computer
